XXasycsaru:sag_1.1_0: pāpaṃ na kuryān manasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke /
XXasycsaru:sag_1.1_1: riktaḥ kāmaiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ duḥkhaṃ na seveta anarthasaṃhitam //
XXasycsaru:sag_2.2_0: ākhyeyaṃ tu parijñāya ākhyātāraṃ na manyate /
XXasycsaru:sag_2.2_1: tad vai na vidyate tasya vadeyur yena taṃ pare //
XXasycsaru:sag_2.3_0: samo viśeṣa uta vāpi hīno yo manyate sa vivadeta tena /
XXasycsaru:sag_2.3_1: vidhātraye 'smin na vikampate yaḥ samo viśiṣṭaś ca na tasya bhavati //
XXasycsaru:sag_2.3_2: ācchidya tṛṣṇām iha nāmarūpe prahāya mānaṃ ca na saṃgam eti /
XXasycsaru:sag_2.4_0: taṃ śāntadhūmam anighaṃ nirāśaṃ nādrākṣus te devamanuṣyaloke /
XXasycsaru:sag_3.1_1: aṃga me gautama brūhi śāntiṃ tvam anukaṃpayā //
XXasycsaru:sag_3.3_0: aśubhāṃ bhāvaya sadā tvam ekāgraḥ susamāhitaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_3.3_1: nirvāpayāśu rāgāgniṃ dahyase mā punaḥ punaḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_4.1_1: kathaṃdhyāyī vipulāṃ kāmatṛṣṇāṃ tīrṇo bhavaty apratilabdhayoktraḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_4.2_0: praśrabdhakāyaḥ suvimuktacitto hy asaṃskurvan smṛtimān akopyaḥ
XXasycsaru:sag_4.3_1: evaṃdhyāyī vipulāṃ kāmatṛṣṇāṃ tīrṇo bhavaty apratilabdhayoktraḥ //
XXasycsaru:4_0: nityotrasto hy ayaṃ loko nityodvignā iyaṃ prajā /
XXasycsaru:sag_5.1_1: yadi kiṃcid anutrastaṃ pṛṣṭa ācakṣva tan mama //
XXasycsaru:sag_6.1_0: kenābhivarṇā janatā praṇītā mārgaś ca nairyāṇikataḥ prayuktaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_6.1_1: kutra sthitaḥ kutra ca śikṣamāṇo nāyaṃ martyaḥ paralokād bibheti //
XXasycsaru:sag_6.2_0: yaḥ śīlavāñ jñānavān bhāvitātmā samāhitaḥ smṛtimān ṛjugataś ca /
XXasycsaru:sag_6.2_1: sarve 'sya śokajvarathāḥ prahīṇāḥ samyaksmṛto yasya cittaṃ vimuktaṃ //
XXasycsaru:sag_6.3_0: tenābhivarṇā janatā praṇītā mārgaś ca nairyāṇikataḥ prayuktaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_6.3_1: atra sthitaḥ atra ca śikṣamāṇo nāyaṃ martyaḥ paralokād bibheti //
XXasycsaru:sag_7.1_0: kathaṃ yaśasvī bhavati kathaṃ bhavati bhogavān /
XXasycsaru:sag_7.1_1: kathaṃ kīrtim avāpnoti kathaṃ mitrāṇi vindati //
XXasycsaru:sag_7.2_0: śīlād yaśasvī bhavati dānād bhavati bhogavān /
XXasycsaru:sag_7.2_1: satyena kīrtim āpnoti dadan mitrāṇi vindati //
XXasycsaru:sag_8.1_0: kutaḥ sarā nivartante kutra vartma na vartate /
XXasycsaru:sag_8.2_0: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ tathā ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manas tathā /
XXasycsaru:sag_8.2_1: yatra nāma ca rūpaṃ ca niḥśeṣam uparuhyate //
XXasycsaru:sag_8.3_0: tataḥ sarā nivartante tatra vartma na vartate /
XXasycsaru:sag_9.1_0: kena svid oghaṃ tarati kenottarati cārṇavaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_9.1_1: duḥkhaṃ tyajati kena svit kena svit pariśudhyati //
XXasycsaru:sag_9.2_0: śraddhayā tarati hy ogham apramādena cārṇavaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_10.1_0: ka etam oghaṃ tarati rātriṃdivam atandritaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_10.1_1: anālambe 'pratiṣṭhe ca ko gaṃbhīre na sīdati //
XXasycsaru:sag_10.3_1: anālambe 'pratiṣṭhe ca sa gaṃbhīre na sīdati //
XXasycsaru:sag_11.1_0: rāgadveṣau bhagavan kinnidānāv aratiratī romaharṣaḥ kuto 'yam /
XXasycsaru:sag_11.1_1: kutaḥsamutthāś ca mano vitarkāḥ kumārakā dhātrīm ivāśrayante //
XXasycsaru:sag_11.2_1: pṛthagviṣaktāḥ kāmeṣu mālutā vā latā vane //
XXasycsaru:sag_11.3_0: rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca itonidānāv aratiratī romaharṣaḥ ito 'yaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_11.3_1: itaḥsamutthāś ca mano vitarkāḥ kumārakā dhātrīm ivāśrayante //
XXasycsaru:sag_11.4_0: ye tān prajānanti yatonidānāṃs te tāṃ janā yakṣa vinodayanti /
XXasycsaru:sag_12.1_1: kāmānāṃ viprahāṇārthaṃ na hi kāṃkṣaty asau bhavaṃ //
XXasycsaru:sag_12.2_0: sa kāryaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsti kṛtārtho brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_12.3_0: yāvan na gādhaṃ labhate na tīram āyūhate sarvagātraiḥ sa tāvat /
XXasycsaru:sag_12.3_1: tīraṃ tu labdhveha saṃtiṣṭhati sthale nāyūhate pāragato nirucyate //
XXasycsaru:sag_12.4_0: eṣopamā dāmale brāhmaṇasya kṣīṇāsravo yo nipako dhyānalābhī /
XXasycsaru:sag_12.4_1: sarve 'sya śokajvarathāḥ prahīṇāḥ samyaksmṛto yasya cittaṃ vimuktam //
XXasycsaru:sag_13_0: yathā kathaṃ tvaṃ bhikṣo anālambe apratiṣṭhe ogham atārṣīḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_13_1: yathā yathāhaṃ devate āyūhāmi tathā tathā saṃsīdāmi /
XXasycsaru:sag_13_2: yathā yathā saṃsīdāmi tathā tathā saṃtiṣṭhe /
XXasycsaru:sag_13_3: yathā yathā saṃtiṣṭhe tathā tathā uhye /
XXasycsaru:sag_13_4: yathā yathāhaṃ devate nāyūhāmi tathā tathā na saṃsīdāmīti vistareṇa śuklapakṣo veditavyaḥ /
XXasycsaru:13_1: eko 'raṇye prasṛto dhyāyase tvaṃ vittād vihīna uta vā prārthayānaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_14.1_0: grāmasya vā kiṃcanāgo nv akārṣīḥ kasmāj janena na karoṣi sakhyaṃ
XXasycsaru:sag_14.1_1: sakhyaṃ na saṃvidyate kena cit tava //
XXasycsaru:sag_14.2_0: arthāprāptyā hṛdayasyeha śāntir jitveha senāṃ priyaśātarūpaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_14.2_1: eko dhyāyī sukham asmy anvabhotsaṃ tasmād janena na karomi sakhyaṃ
XXasycsaru:sag_14.2_2: sakhyaṃ na saṃvidyate kena cid mama //
XXasycsaru:sag_15_1: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukham //
XXasycsaru:sag_16_1: apramattā na mriyante pramattās tu sadā mṛtāḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_17_1: bhūyas tṛṣṇā vivardhate sā gāḍhīkurute 'sya bandhanaṃ //
XXasycsaru:sag_18_1: ātmanaḥ priyakartāraṃ taṃ janaḥ kurute priyaṃ //
XXasycsaru:sag_19_1: ātmanā tan na kurvīta karmabaddho hi pāpakaḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_20_0: subhāṣitaṃ hy uttamam āhur āryāḥ priyaṃ vaden nāpriyaṃ tad dvitīyaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_20_1: satyaṃ vaden nānṛtaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ dharmaṃ vaden nādharmaṃ tat caturtham //
XXasycsaru:sag_21_0: śraddhātha hrīḥ śīlam athāpi dānaṃ dharmā ime satpuruṣapraśastāḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_21_1: etaṃ hi mārgaṃ divigaṃ vadanti etena vai gacchati devalokam //
XXasycsaru:sag_22_0: śrutvā dharmaṃ vijānāti śrutvā pāpān nivartate /
XXasycsaru:sag_22_1: śrutvā anarthaṃ tyajati śrutvā prāpnoti nirvṛtim //
XXasycsaru:sag_23_0: ākāśasamo na lipyate indrakīlapratimo na kaṃpate /
XXasycsaru:sag_23_1: hrada iva samupetakardame saṃsāre ramate na paṇḍitaḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_24.1_0: ye rūpeṇa pramiṇvanti māṃ ghoṣeṇānuyānti ca /
XXasycsaru:sag_24.1_1: cchandarāgavaśopetā na mā jānanti te janāḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_24.2_0: adhyātmaṃ ca vijānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati /
XXasycsaru:sag_24.2_1: adhyātmaphaladarśī yaḥ sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate //
XXasycsaru:sag_24.3_0: adhyātmaṃ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati /
XXasycsaru:sag_24.4_0: adhyātmaṃ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati /
XXasycsaru:sag_24.5_0: adhyātmaṃ ca vijānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati /
XXasycsaru:sag_24.5_1: dhīro niḥsaraṇaprajño na sa ghoṣeṇa nīyate //
XXasycsaru:sag_25_1: arajasy arajā bhavati rakto bālo nirucyate //
XXasycsaru:sag_26_1: yatra rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca māno mrakṣaś ca gāhate //
XXasycsaru:sag_27_0: kūrmaḥ svake 'ṅgāni yathā kapāle bhikṣur nidadhyān manaso vitarkāni /
XXasycsaru:sag_27_1: aniśrito 'nyān aviheṭhamānaḥ parinirvṛto nāpavadeta kaṃ cit //
XXasycsaru:sag_28_0: tulyam atulyaṃ ca saṃbhavaṃ bhavasaṃskāram avāsṛjan muniḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_29_0: nāsti kāmasamaḥ paṃko nāsti dveṣasamo grahaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_29_1: nāsti mohasamaṃ jālaṃ nāsti tṛṣṇāsamā nadī //
XXasycsaru:sag_30_0: ākāśe vai padaṃ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyakaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_31_0: sthitiḥ prapaṃcāś ca na santi yasya yaḥ saṃdānaṃ parighaṃ cātivṛttaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_31_1: taṃ nistṛṣṇaṃ muniṃ carantaṃ na vijānāti sadevako 'pi lokaḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_32_0: yasya vitarkā vidhūpitā adhyātmam avikalpitā aśeṣaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_32_1: saṃgaṃ so 'tītya rūpasaṃjñāṃ caturyogāpagato na jātim eti //
XXasycsaru:sag_33_0: dadataḥ puṇyaṃ pravardhate vairaṃ saṃyamato na cīyate /
XXasycsaru:sag_33_1: kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayatas tu nirvṛtaḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_35_1: cittasya dāmanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham //
XXasycsaru:sag_36_0: cittanimittasya kovidaḥ pravivekasya ca vindate rasaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_36_1: dhyāyī nipakaḥ pratismṛto bhuṃkte prītisukhaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ //
XXasycsaru:sag_37_0: aśilpajīvī laghur ātmakāmo jitendriyaḥ sarvato vipramuktaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_37_1: anokasārī hy amamo nirāśaḥ kāmān prahāyaikacaro yas sa bhikṣuḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_38_1: damayati durdamaṃ cittaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ bravīmy ahaṃ //
XXasycsaru:sag_39.1_0: kenāyaṃ nivṛto lokaḥ kenāyaṃ na prakāśate /
XXasycsaru:sag_39.1_1: kiṃ cābhilepanaṃ brūṣe kiṃ ca tasya mahad bhayam //
XXasycsaru:sag_39.2_1: jalpābhilepanaṃ brūmi duḥkhaṃ tasya mahad bhayaṃ //
XXasycsaru:sag_39.3_0: sravanti sarvataḥ srotāḥ srotasāṃ kiṃ nivāraṇaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_39.3_1: srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi kena srotaḥ pidhīyate //
XXasycsaru:sag_39.4_0: yāni srotāṃsi lokasya smṛtiḥ teṣāṃ nivāraṇaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_39.4_1: srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi prajñayā hi pidhīyate //
XXasycsaru:sag_39.5_0: prajñāyāś ca smṛteś caiva nāmarūpasya sarvaśaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_39.5_1: ācakṣva pṛṣṭa etan me kutraitad uparudhyate //
XXasycsaru:sag_39.6_0: prajñā caiva smṛtiś caiva nāmarūpaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_39.7_1: ācakṣva pṛṣṭa etan me yathātatham asaṃśayaḥ //
XXasycsaru:sag_39.8_0: adhyātaṃ ca bahirdhā ca vedanāṃ nābhinandataḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_39.9_0: ye ca saṃkhyātadharmāṇo ye ca śaikṣāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_39.9_1: teṣāṃ me nipakasyeryāṃ pṛṣṭaḥ prabrūhi mārṣa //
XXasycsaru:sag_40.1_0: kāmān kāmāyamānasya tasya cet tat samṛdhyati /
XXasycsaru:sag_40.1_1: addhā prītamanā bhavati labdhvā martyo yad īpsitaṃ //
XXasycsaru:sag_40.2_1: te kāmāḥ parihīyaṃte śalyaviddha iva rūpyate //
XXasycsaru:sag_40.3_0: yaḥ kāmāṃ parivarjayati sarpasyeva śirāt padaṃ /
XXasycsaru:sag_40.3_1: sa imāṃ viṣaktikāṃ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate //
XXasycsaru:sag_40.4_1: striyo dāsān pṛthakkāmān yo naro hy abhigṛdhyati //
XXasycsaru:sag_40.5_0: abalaṃ vā balīyāṃso mṛdnaṃty enaṃ parisravāḥ /
XXasycsaru:sag_40.5_1: tata enaṃ duḥkham anveti bhinnāṃ nāvam ivodakaṃ //
XXasycsaru:sag_40.5_2: yasya tv etat samucchinnaṃ tālamastakavad dhataṃ /
